name: World War Two
blurb: The deadliest global conflict in human history that reshaped international politics and borders.

name: French Revolution
blurb: A period of radical social and political upheaval that transformed French society and influenced nations worldwide.

name: Apollo 11 Moon Landing
blurb: First human mission to land on the Moon, fulfilling Kennedy's ambitious goal.

name: JFK Assassination
blurb: The shocking assassination of President Kennedy that changed America forever.

name: Attack on Pearl Harbor
blurb: The surprise attack that brought the United States into World War II.

name: March on Washington
blurb: The historic march where Martin Luther King Jr. delivered his 'I Have a Dream' speech.

name: Sinking of the Titanic
blurb: The 'unsinkable' ship's tragic maiden voyage that shocked the world.

name: Boston Tea Party
blurb: Colonial protest against British taxation that helped spark the American Revolution.

name: Cuban Missile Crisis
blurb: The closest the world came to nuclear war during the Cold War standoff.

name: Wall Street Crash of 1929
blurb: Black Tuesday marked the beginning of the Great Depression.

name: Atomic Bombing of Hiroshima
blurb: The first use of nuclear weapons in warfare that changed history forever.

name: Watergate Scandal
blurb: The political scandal that led to President Nixon's resignation.
